refnamediv.refpurpose: Accesses table values by incremental sampling with linear interpolation.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Accesses table values by incremental sampling with linear interpolation.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: kres oscil1i idel, kamp, idur [, ifn]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: idel -- delay in seconds before oscil1i incremental sampling begins.
idur -- duration in seconds to sample through the oscil1i table just once. A zero or negative value will cause all initialization to be skipped.
ifn -- (optional) function table number. oscil1i requires the extended guard point. The default value is -1 indicating a sine wave.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: oscil1i is an interpolating unit in which the fractional part of index is used to interpolate between adjacent table entries. The smoothness gained by interpolation is at some small cost in execution time (see also oscili, etc.), but the interpolating and non-interpolating units are otherwise interchangeable.
